```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### What to submit for Week 2

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus?" = c(unchecked, 
               checked, 
               checked,
               checked),

Description = c("Complete modules in Data Camp that gives you the tools to assess, wrangle, and explore data sets.",
               "Complete a task on running descriptive statistics in R.",
               "Build a case to test a population.",
               "Submit your Week 2 Reflections."),

Location = c("[Link](/lesson/02-lesson/#data-camp-1)", 
             "[Link](/assignment/02-exercise/#task-assessing-common-descriptives)",
             "[Link](/assignment/#anchorwk2)",
             "[Link](/readings/02-readings/#questions-to-reflect-on-1)")

)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'clc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em")
```
